Roland MDX-40a

Desktop Milling Machine used for creating models from a variety of materials such as wood, abs, ceramic, nylon, and more

Zing Laser Engraver

Laser tool able to engrave 2D and 3D images onto wood, acrylic, glass, metal, and other materials.

Makerbot Replicator 2X


Uses and Constraints

Materials

~ABS Plastic: Prints in one or two colors

Dimensions

~Maximum Print Size:9.7”W x 6.4”L x 6.1”H

~Minimum layer height: 0.1mm

Made by the Makerbot

Thingiverse is an open source forum of 3D printing, laser cutting, and CNC designs. It is a great resource for inpiration. Download any design, edit it, and bring it to life! Below are a few fun examples of things you can make
